notesStmt.note: First appeared in 1681. Cf. Univ. of Calif. Lib., Berkeley. Author-title cat., 1963.

While all sources agree Leoline Jenkins wrote at least one letter to the King on this subject, some sources feel this particular letter signed with a pseud. is really by Jenkins (cf. McAlpin Cat. and Wing) and others feel Philanax Verax is a separate person (cf. BM and UCB Author-title Cat.)
